description: Enforces Intel Factor 1: participant status analysis
legal_standard: Intel Corp. v. Advanced Micro Devices, Inc., 542 U.S. 241, 264 (2004)
key_cases: Gorsoan Ltd. v. Bullock, 652 F. App'x 44 (2d Cir. 2016)
checklist_items: Evidence that target is NOT a party to foreign proceeding
If target IS a party, justification for Section 1782 aid

required_context: person from whom discovery is sought is a participant
nonparticipant in the matter arising abroad
not a party to the foreign proceeding

chroma_query_template: Intel Factor 1 non-participant not a party foreign proceeding {case_context}
